title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI + REST server that downloads, caches, and serves GGUF models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama server (PyPI package).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain partner package that adds Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding providers.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration to use any Ollama model for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama written in SvelteKit.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama with sync/async APIs and model management helpers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, supports sessions & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and WebUI on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as Generators and Embedders for pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server (generate, chat, embed).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, Weaviate, and RAG extras.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama server enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama with chosen models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize, rewrite, or query notes using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python repo showing how to build a RAG system with LangChain, Ollama, and Chroma.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension to chat with Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with TypeScript definitions.
